Bubblegum almost jumped in shock of Marcelines intrusion, almost spilling a test tube. "Marceline!" She yelled as she put the test tube filled with some liquid on the counter. "Glob! You scared me!"

1211311.content:
"A youth potion." Princess Bubblegum said.

"A potion? As in magic?" Marceline floated toward the counter. "I thought you didn't believe in magic."

"Well, I don't." Bubblegum answered. "I'm just putting it in simpler terms, because I highly doubt that you can pronounced the name I actually have for it."

"Oh, you're no fun." Marceline lifted the vial. "Nothing can be magical. It's always 'mutations' or some 'scientific explanation' for you. Always having to be picky about how things work." She chuckled. "So how does it work? Do I chug it or just pour it on my head."

"Either way." Bubblegum said. "If you pour it on yourself, you just turn younger. But drinking it will also cause your mind to become younger too, making you as smart as you were when younger. Actually, since you already have it, can you bring it up to the tenth shelf behind you? I need to put it there and I can reach it without a ladder, but since you can float..."

"Eh, sure." Marceline said as she flew up and placed the vial on the tenth shelf. She then floated down and landed next to Bubblegum.

Suddenly:
1211311.title: Youth potion

12113111.content:
The floor suddenly rumbled. As a defensive, Marceline jumped up and floated. "The math?"

"Oh don't worry. It just a tremor." Bubblegum said as the tremor stopped. "It's been very common lately."

The floor rumbled again, but this time, more aggressively, the doors and glasses on the tables began to shake.

The items on the shelves began to shake as well. Some even falling off.
Bubblegum looked up to see her youth potion about to meet the same fate- and fall on Marceline.

"Marceline!" She yelled. "Look out!"

"What? Why?" Marceline asked, but it was too late. The glass vial already broke over her head, releasing the liquid all over her head, leading to the rest of her body. "Ah!" She yelped in short pain. While the glass didn't cut her, the impact would've left a bump or bruise. "Geez, that hur-" she yawned. "Bonnie?" She asked, almost ready to doze off, "I'm not sure if I'm feeling to great. I suddenly feel ti- tired."
She snored as she lowered herself to the floor.

And much to Princess Bubblegum's surprise, she began to shrink. She shrunk until she was the size and shape of a small two year old.
"Marcy?"

"If you really must go, we can do this another way. I have a measuring cup here -- pee into it and we'll see how much you were holding". Marceline make PB turn around as she did the deed, moaning in relief as she finally released her bladder. She read the number "250 mL"

"That's like a small child -- the average person can hold about 600. It looks like your bladder size is a lot smaller than it should be" PB said, "There are a few reasons this could be. I'll have to analyze your other test results, but don't worry, 95% odds is it will be completely treatable. I'l get back to you in a few days. In the meantime..."
1212221222121211122.title: Bubblegum didn't allow it.

choices: Requested to spend the night at the candy castle.
12122212221212111222.content:
(post by ToadWarrior)

"Just make sure you're not far away from a bathroom." Princess bubblegum insisted, while marceline got herself redressed. "Thanks PB..." The vampire queen said in embarrassment at the display she just put up. She was tired from spending most of her night on tests so she...
12122212221212111222.title: Make sure you're always close to a toilet

choices: She woke up and had to Pee
She woke up the next morning wet
121222122212121112221.content: "Heeyyyy PB you mind if I"... Stay here tonight bubble gum finished sure she led her to her room three doors down " here is your room for good night " thanks PB soon Marceline drifted off to sleep...
121222122212121112221.title: Requested to spend the night at the candy castle.

choices: tried to go to the bathroom
decided to pee in a vase
1212221222121211122211.content: Marceline slept peacefully in the candy castle, but half way through the night she was suddenly jolted awake by a bladder full to the limit. "Oh no, not again!" she groaned to herself as her hands darted to her crotch. She could tell from the previous few days that making it to the bathroom would be a battle, but she had to try. Marceline got up and...
1212221222121211122211.title: She woke up and had to Pee

choices: She denies she has a problem
She admits she is having control issues
12122212222.content: As she saw the toilet, her bladder twinged and she spurted a little bit. Immediately Marceline yanked off her pants and sat on the toilet, sighing in relief as she peed. It wasn't too long before she finished, and the small amount that came out surprised her. She reflected on the many close calls she had been having lately.
12122212222.title: She barely makes it to the toilet.

choices: She starts considering wearing protection in case of more near accidents
121222122221.content:
(post by ToadWarrior)

After she cleaned up, and washed her hands. Marceline looked at herself in the mirror. "Sheesh...Maybe I'm just having bad luck lately?...Well I'll just stop drinking anything before bed." She told herself, insisting that she was just having bad luck with her bladder. Not wanting to admit she needed help out of embarrassment. With that she went back to bed.
121222122221.title: She denies she has a problem

choices: She goes out to have fun partying later
1212221222211.content: Marceline had a restless sleep as all her near accidents buzzed around in her head. Finally she drifted off for a few hours, as she continued to replay them in her dreams. She dreamed that Finn and Jake had been spying on her again in her closet as she crossed her legs and knocked on a locked bathroom door. As they laughed at her, she spurted again... later, she dreamed of floating around in the clouds, forgetting all her earlier troubles finally, and was feeling very happy, comfortable and refreshed when she woke up.
1212221222211.title: She goes back to sleep

choices: Well, time to crack these open
I'll keep them stored for now, I probably won't have any more problems
1212221222212.content: Even though Marceline was sure that it would turn out to be nothing she couldn't shake the fact that that she had had near accidents every day for the last four days, sometimes multiple times. "I suppose I ought to get some pads at least -- it will save me from more leaking" Marceline thought to herself. The next day she was going to do it, but was to embarrassed to go buy them herself. For kicks, she found the door ghast from her first close call at a "Spooks Motel", and knocked it around until it agreed to go to the store for her, "this is all your fault" she said, half jokingly. She knew it was way too intimidated to tell anyone her problems. Soon it dutifully returned with the pads and giving it another kick she knocked it out of her cave. Marceline thought
1212221222212.title: She starts considering wearing protection in ca...

choices: Someone was knocking at the door.
12122212222122.content:
(post by Toadwarrior)

Marceline decides it was better to only use them if her problem ever reappeared, she presumed it wouldn't but only a few hours after...
12122212222122.title: I'll keep them stored for now, I probably w...

121222122221222.content:
Marceline answered her door to see it was Finn and Jake, yelling over each other in excitement the moment they saw her. After sitting them down it took a few moments for her to get them to calm down enough to actually understand what they wanted. Apparently they had gotten kicked out of their house by a demon and wanted her help to take care of it. She knew it must have been pretty tough if these two meatheads would actually ask for help. "Come on Marceline, you're the best at dealing with this kind of spooky stuff" Jake said jokingly.

"Well why don't you tell me a little about it. What does it look like, what's its powers, you know?" Marceline said exasperated. She shifted in her seat a little as her bladder started to bug her again.

"Its... uh... a fish? A scary fish! That's also kind of a bird. I don't know, its weird" Jake said, then Finn launched into an energetic monologue of how he had fought it to a standstill, only for it to start laying eggs around the house that had started hatching. Marceline squirmed as his confused storytelling continued.
121222122221222.title: Someone was knocking at the door.

1212221222212221.content:
(post by ToadWarrior)

The vampire queen felt a sharp pain from her bladder, and thought excusing herself now was better than wetting herself. "One second guys, I need to do something..." Marceline lied to excuse herself, before heading upstairs rushing to her bathroom. Finn and jake look at each other confusedly.

Marceline was groaning while rushing to her bathroom, one of her hands dug deeply into her groin. She just grabbed the doorknob and rushed inside closing it behind her. She approached the toilet and pulled down her pants, a spurt escaping as she plopped down on the toilet. Sighing in relief as she began to relieve herself, her pee cascading into the toilet. She was wondering what she could do about this bladder situation of hers lately. If they wanted her to fight that weird fish bird. She was considering wearing some form of protection from accidents so she...
1212221222212221.title: She excuses herself

12122212222122211.content:
"I don't like it, but I suppose it might save me from some embarrassment later on." Marceline dug around for the package the ghast had gotten her. As she fished it out of a closet in the bathroom, she saw it had actually got her the wrong item! She was hoping for just pads, but what she saw was a package of babyish Pull-ups, with floral designs. Her face turned red as she groaned to herself "i'm going to have to kick his butt again for this..."

Nonetheless Marceline, her face beet red, put on one of the Pull-ups under her jeans. "I'll go get the pads later... this will be better than nothing. Its only for today!" she tried to reassure herself. She then met with Finn and Jake, and they went over to their house, where she saw egg sacs covering it. The fish demon emerged, and Marceline recognized it as one she knew from the Nightosphere, Larry. It must have escaped somehow and come to Ooo.
12122212222122211.title: Wears protection.

122.content: What is the set up?
122.title: Princess Bubblegum

1222.content:
Princess Bubblegum had been enjoying herself having a Mallow tea ceremony with Finn, Jake, and Lumpy Space Princess, even though the two adventurers weren't any good at it; she chuckled as Finn accidentally bounced himself off the marshmallows and Jake soon followed him, until LSP bit Jake by accident. This bite infected Jake with "the lumps", and he and Finn went to lumpy space to cure it.

PB would have joined them but she had her own business to attend to. She felt a twinge in her bladder and holding her formal dress up ran the other way, saying to herself "I should not have drunk so much tea!" as she looked for a place to relieve herself. She had had to go for a while, but was enjoying her tea ceremony so much she ignored it completely, and it was coming back to bite her. She wasn't far from her palace and ran towards the kingdom gates hoping she could make it in time. By the time she got to her castle she was really starting to feel panicked.

Inside the large building she scanned around thinking of where the nearest bathroom was. Identifying it on the next floor, she hurried up a flight of stairs. The steps were pure torture and as she got to the top, she leaked a little in her panties. "No! This is my nicest dress!" she thought. She got to the bathroom but saw Peppermint Butler and some servants mulling around. "Sorry your Highness, Cinnamon Bun tried using this bathroom, and he accidentally stuck himself in the toilet! Someone needs to help that guy..." her butler said. Princess Bubblegum wanted to scream, but her bladder couldn't be ignored any more, and she ran into the next hall completely wetting herself. She leaned against the wall as she totally lost control and wet her dress. For a moment she started to break down and sob, but she calmed down and pressed a secret button a ways away, letting her into a secret passage so nobody could see her. Ever the logical thinker, she immediately started wondering about if this happened again. What if she embarrassed herself at a public event or speech? She would never live it down.
1222.title: She starts having "control" issues

1223.content:
Maybe nothing is wrong with her. Maybe she just spends so much time in her lab she saves time by wearing diapers so she doesn't have to leave and use the bathroom?

Or an experiment goes wrong and she needs to wear a diaper constantly?
1223.title: Other

12232.content:
It was another fine day in the Candy Kingdom where Princess Bubblegum was busy, constructing her latest invention. As she did, Peppermint Butler came into the room.

"Fair princess," The butler said. "I believe you have a visitor downstairs...and it's not Finn and Jake, surprisingly."

"Whoever it is, they can probably wait. I'm in the middle of an important tinkering and I'd like to get this finished posthaste." Princess Bubblegum said to him, not once even looking away from what she was working on.

Peppermint Butler hissed his tongue in hesitation and replied, "Well, she's not the type to say no to anyone, your majesty."

"Well just who is it then?" She asked, wondering who could be so stubborn as to interrupt her while she was busy with such important work.

"Take a guess." said a familar voice whispering RIGHT into Bubblegum's ear.

Having expected as much, being surprised like that had little effect on Bubblegum. "I figured as much. Marceline what is it you want? I'm in the middle of something extremely important." She said. Marceline giggled to herself as she floated away from Bubblegum. "Aww, come on, Bonnie". the vampire chuckled. "Don't be such a sour-ball....I need something to borrow".

"What do you want Marceline?" Bubblegum said as she finally took her eyes of her work to keep them on Marceline, not wanting her to touch anything she shouldn't be.

Marceline looked around quickly, making sure no one was around; Peppermint Butler had left the room for the sake of privacy and the guards were all outside parolling. The vampire floated close to Bubblegum and said, "I need to borrow some thread for Hambo." Marceline then pulled out her scruffy-looking old teddy bear from her bag, one of the buttons missing again. "It's really important."

"And you don't have any thread at home? Or you couldn't find any on your way here? I find it a little hard to believe you had to come all the way to me for something as simple as a bit of thread." Bubblegum said.

"Pffftt, you got better thread than all of the cheap ones I can find out there." scoffed Marceline.

"Fine fine. Whatever, if it'll get you out of my hair and get me back to work faster then sure." Bubblegum said.

As Bubblegum huffed and looked around for thread, Marceline spotted a glimpse of PB's newest device...it somewhat looked like a large handheld machine that almost resembled a pacifier.

"...soooo what'cha making?" The vampire asked curiously.

As Bubblegum looked around she explained. "It's a new device I'm working on that can reverse the ageing process. Though it's not entirely finished."

Marceline smirked, "Reverse aging, huh? You know, you could just get an aging spell or something".

Bubblegum just rolled her eyes at that. Opening a cupboard and seeing a spool of thread inside. She grabbed it and brought it over to Marceline. "Except this device reverses age, within set parameters that's safe to use, or at least it will be once it's complete." She said.

Marceline then asked, "What does it do now?"

"Well, it can only set back a persons mental age back just for now, and even then it's a bit iffy on the exact age to go back to." She explained.

"Ever tested it out on someone?" Marceline said smirking.

"Well no, I wanted to try and steady up it's range of regression a bit more, though I think with the few adjustments I've recently made it might be ready for a test run, at least of it's mental regressing capabilities." She said.

"Oh really?" The vampire said. "Who's your test-monkey?"

"I don't have one at the moment, seeing as the device is one way, I need to find someone who I can use to take control data from first." She said.

Marceline paused for a moment and then smirked a little.

"Bonnie," she asked. "...mind if I check that thing out?"

"I guess? It's not even very interesting to look at yet. I'm going to work on the visual appeal after it's working fully." She said.

With that, Marceline picked up the device and turned around to the control panel; it had various dials and switches set for ages of sorts. "So....how does this thing work?" She said confused.

"Well the dials on the left are supposed to be for changing a persons physical age, which doesn't work yet. At the most it could make your younger by about a year or so. The other dial on the right is for mental age. Which works, but I'm not sure if I fixed it's problem with either making it younger than the displayed age or not getting to the displayed age, though it should only be off by about a year or two." Bubblegum explained to her.

The vampire queen tinkered with the controls playfully, flipping the mental age down to a 1-year-old level. "Like this?" Marceline said.

"Essentially yes, it's supposed to work like a gun. Though it could have far more practical applications than just using it to defend yourself." She said.

Marceline said, "Ah, like making you relax and less tense?"

"Well yes, but it could also have rehabilitation applications." She said.

"Whoops." Marceline said casually, as if on purposed as she flipped the on-switch of the machine, blasting a pink and baby blue beam at Bubblegum, engulfing her in it.
12232.title: The Paci-Fire Protocol

122321.content:
Bubblegum had no time to react as suddenly a blast came from the device and hit her dead on. After it stopped she simply stood there.

Marceline then burst into laughter. "HAHAH! You really got me with this age-reversing device, Bon-Bon. Really...as if this works! Look at you, you're still standing all normal-like."

She didn't say anything, she began to sway slightly though, as if her balance had suddenly been impacted. Marceline's laughter even slowed and stopped and raised her eyebrows at Bubblegum's weird stance. "Bon....you alright?

In a few short moments her rocking had tipped too far in one direction and she began to tumble towards the floor.

Marceline reacts actually and catches Bubblegum before she impacted on the floor. "Gotcha! ....come on, Bonnie...say something."

As Bubblegum looked at Marceline, her eyes seemed a bit wider as she said.....
122321.title: The machine affects Bubblegum instantly.

choices: Marceline decides to hide Bubblegum at her place
1223211.content:
"...gaa?" The vampire queen looked at Bubblegum perplexed a little.

Bubblegum reached out and grabbed onto Marcelines hair, a thin line of drool running down from her mouth. "OW! >~<" Marceline said in pain, accidently dropping Bubblegum on the floor.

After falling onto the floor, tears began to well up in Bubblegum's eyes, her lips quivering slightly.

Worried about someone finding out, Marceline tried to shush the now babyish Bubblegum and said, "Shhhhh....don't cry, Bonnie!" The vampire queen quickly looked around for something to ease the girl, but nothing was around...except Hambo.

She began to snivel lightly, whimpering, on the verge of bursting out into full blown wailing.

Marceline covered her ears from the princess' wails and then pulled out Hambo. She sighed in annoyance before pushing her beloved toy into Bubblegum's arms, holding to appease her crying. With the toy in arms Bubblegum quieted down, looking at it, staring at it, wondering what it was exactly.

"That's Hambo....he's...a really good friend of mine." Marceline said sincerely. "You can hold on him for a bit 'til we can...try to get your mind back to normal.

Bubblegum continued to keep a hold of Hambo, a bit of drool dripping off of her chin and onto her dress. As she watched the mentally regressed princess babble and cuddle with the stuffed animal....
1223211.title: "Gaaa...."

122322.content:
Marcelines eyes widened as she realized this regression gun was all too real. She quickly put it back down on the table in a panic. But when the light faded she saw bubblegum standing there unefected not even aware that the gun had gone off.

“Did you say something Marci” Bonnie said turning around “hey! What are you doing yah ding dong” she said peeved.

“Well-I- I didn’t mean to...” Marceline stammered, believing she’d been caught, but then the princess bent over and picked up a wrench the vampire had apparently knocked off the table “woo, dodged a bullet there” Marceline thought with a sigh of relief”

“How many times do I have to tell you not to touch my toys”

“Yeah, sorry. Wait what did you say?”

“I said don’t touch my stuff”

Marceline nervously watched from a distance not sure if she was ok until she realized something off in Bonnibelles...
122322.title: The machine affects Bubblegum slowly.

choices: ...was suckling contently on a pacifier clipped to her overalls.
1223221.content:
Marceline rubbed her eyes as she blinked; she could have sworn something was different about Bonnie.

Rather than her usual princess dress with her lab-coat over it (it was almost amusingly cute), Bonnie was instead in what looked like an long-sleeved overall-onesie with purple flowers decorated all over it with a striped pink shirt beneath. The princess was continuing her research, moving over to gather the rest of her supplies and beakers and.....and....

Crinkle~

The vampire queen blushed, noticing how weirdly big Bonnie's butt seemed to be bulged beneath the overalls as well as the noticeably loud crinkling that came from it as well. Was Bonnie wearing....Naaah! It was too stupid to even suggest that Bonnie, one of the most smartest people she knew, was wearing something like that. But then again...she was hit with her own laser....

"Hey, Bonnie, are you sure you're alright?" Marceline tapped the shoulder of her friend, just to make sure she was wrong about her hunch. The princess turned around....
1223221.title: A Change of Royal Attire

choices: What’s wrong with these clothes, I thought I looked cute
12232212.content:
“Uh yeah, I’m perfectly fine. Why, do you need something?” She responded looking up from her research notes, her pen now transformed into a crayon

“No I’m ok” Marceline said not sure how to proceed with this strangeness

“It’s no problem at all, I was about to call in peppermint butler for some snacky time. I just need time to figure out how tah make this stupid thingy work” the princess said as she crossed the room with a definite waddle

“ Bonnie, don’t you see something just a little wrong with your outfit” the vampire queen said trying desperately to get her to notice what’s going on

Bonnibelle looked down to inspect her clothing before saying
12232212.title: ...replied, "Uh yeah, I'm perfectly fin...

info.brief_description:
Characters from Adventure Time end up in diapers!
You decide how!
info.description:
Introductory Note: I DO NOT, in any way, own Adventure Time or any of its characters. They are property of Pendleton Ward and Frederator Studios, I guess. All the same, not mine.

Just a few boring ol' rules first:

1-Please try to keep things reasonable. (i.e. No crazy ridiculous orgies or what-have-you)
2-I appreciate that everyone likes to contribute to stories, but try to make the writing halfway decent. Anything that's a grammatical train wreck or practically illegible will probably be removed.
3-3rd person format works for this
4-Keep the choices as choices the character makes, not choices between events (ex. "Marceline opens the red door" is good, "Marceline finds a nursery behind the door" is better saved for the results of a choice, not the choice itself)
5-Just keep it math, folks.

With that, come on in and have fun. It's ADVENTURE TIME!!!!
